# coverVertical

**Type Property**

A transition where the new view slides up from the bottom of the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
static var coverVertical: Self { get }
```

## Accessing transitions

- **crossDissolve**: A transition where the current view fades out while the new view fades in at the same time.
- **flipHorizontal**: A transition where the current view flips horizontally to reveal the new view.
- **partialCurl**: A transition where one corner of the current view curls up, revealing the new view underneath.
